headline: This Top Oil Stock Smart Plan Puts It in a Stronger Position to Weather Volatile Crude Oil Prices
summary: Devon Energy delivered better-than-expected oil production in the first quarter.  Its smart business optimization plan will boost its free cash flow by $1 billion by the end of 2026.  Devon Energy (NYSE: DVN) has spent several years building a larger-scale, low-cost U.S. onshore oil and gas producer.
